participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and energetic, Ethan loves exploring the outdoors and is always up for an adrenaline rush.
participant_1.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. my father was a construction worker. i am a huge coffee lover. i hate the color pink. i do not drink alcohol.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is laid-back and enjoys a blend of simple pleasures and spontaneous adventures.
participant_2.background: i live in a house. i have a boyfriend. i don't drink soda. i like to take walks. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.
